archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Lecture Capture, Mediasite
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: The capture and subsequent distribution of lectures, is now also an essential part of the learning experience, allowing students to refer back to lectures that they may have missed or to facilitate revision, etc. The challenge is to find technological solutions which are easy for the lecturer to use to record the lecture and which then be effectively catalogued for distribution via the existing platforms (e.g. Blackboard).
